data.meta_description: Is the climate in Ufa (in Russia) in february good? Discover the weather forecast in february 2025 to prepare your trip.
data.text:
Ufa in february: average Weather, Temperature and Climate

Best time to go to Ufa?

Weather in Ufa in february 2025

The weather in Ufa in the month of february comes from statistical datas on the past years. You can view the weather statistics for the whole month, but also by using the tabs for the beginning, the middle and the end of the month.

Evolution of daily average temperature and precipitation in Ufa in february

These charts show the evolution of average minimum/maximum temperatures as well as average daily precipitation volume in Ufa in february.

The climate of Ufa in february is very bad

In february in Ufa, the climate is quite dry (with 58mm of rainfall over 4 days). It should be noted an improvement from the previous month since in january it receives an average of 62mm of precipitation over 4 days.

The climate is icy in this location february. Do not forget to take with you warm clothes!. The thermometer averaged maximum of -8°C. The minimum is -14°C. Thus, the mean temperature average on this month of february in Ufa is -11°C. Note that seasonal normals in contrast with those observed in Ufa in the month of february with a maximum record of 2°C in 2016 and a minimum record of -35°C in 2012.

On this month of february, day length in Ufa is generally 09:45. Sunrise is at 08:38 and sunset is at 18:23.

Weather data for Ufa in february:

Weather data for Ufa for february are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Ufa. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Ufa can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags or check for the best time in year to go to Ufa.
